history.content:
Hey everyone, my name is Uma and I am a DeCal Facilitator in Data Science Society's Data Science DeCal this semester! We are currently looking for passionate TAs for the course, as well as others to join various consulting and academic development positions within the club itself.

DSS is UC Berkeley's first student-run, not-for-profit organization focused on data science and its interdisciplinary applications. Since our founding in 2016, we have united students from a wide range of disciplines behind our shared passion for all things data.

 

We are recruiting for the Fall 2020 semester! Our goal is to find passionate educators and consultants to join our team. Find out how you can get involved below.

 

Fall 2020 Main Recruitment Event (this contains a timeline and easy access to all the events below!)

https://www.facebook.com/events/643620276521839/

 

Join our Discord for 24/7 Q&A with our club! We have Discord Drop-In tabling from 9am-4pm every weekday starting today. 

discord.gg/nrSntva

 

All events are PDT and will be held at this link: dssberkeley.com/zoom

----------------------------

Sign up for a Coffee Chat - August 27-September 3 @ https://tinyurl.com/dsscoffeechats

Infosession - August 31st 7-8 PM (this will be recorded and posted on our youtube channel!)

STEM-Palooza Q&A - September 1st 7-8 PM

Case Workshop - September 2nd 8-9 PM

Meet the Society - September 3rd 7:30-9PM

—————————--

Committee Application Due - September 4th 11:59 PM

GM and DeCal Student Applications Due - September 9th 11:59 PM: dssberkeley.com/apply
history.subject: Join Data Science Society!
